data.name: Lumbah Jump
data.detailed_description:
A difficult, pixel art platformer where your goal is to reach the top! - Inspired by the fantastic Jump King and Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy!

Following the adventure of Lumbah, you embark on a precision-platforming adventure from Lumbah's home in the woods, all the way up into the clouds above, but be warned, the path is difficult and will require patience, and all of your platforming skills!

- Multiple Stage Precision Platforming Adventure
We go from Lumbah's home in the woods all the way up into the clouds... But it won't be easy.
- Difficult gameplay
If you fall you lose your progress, your progress is auto-saved
- Constant Action
Lumbah runs continuously, so you'll need to be quick with your reactions or find a safe space to relax for a while.
- 1-Button Gameplay
You only need 1 button to play, press and hold to jump higher, or tap for small jumps... It's accessible and easy to pick up but difficult to master!
- Hand-Drawn Pixel Graphics
I have drawn all the content in this game myself, experience the Lumbahverse in full hand-drawn pixel art glory!

data.short_description: A difficult, pixel art platformer. You can't stop, but can you reach the top?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
